summary: More than 13 years of experience in finance, operations, management. During my career, I gained experience in accounting, financial planning, analysis and control. Continuous of the hard work i have been promoted several times until being regional CFO for central Europe (9 Countries) and being a member of the M&A/acquisition community.

treasury_media.title: Transcom Cairo Grand Opening
treasury_media.description:
Together with Egyptian Minister of Communication and Information Technology Dr. Amr Talaat, Embassy of Sweden in Cairo Håkan Emsgård, Transcom Global CEO Jonas Dahlberg, our visionary entrepreneur Robert Kresing, and some of our amazing talent!

Transcom entered Egypt in 2020 and it's a smashing success. We just opened our new site for 800 amazing team members, and it's almost sold out. That's why we've already decided to increase capacity to 1200 workstations. And this is just the beginning!

awards.title: Creating a New Report for the Region Subsidiaries
awards.description:
Thank you for your availability today. I am sending you the report ‘you built’ with the adjustments we mentioned.
I will continue to share it with the other countries to see if they are interested. Thank you for sharing your analysis with me.

awards.title: Financial Analyst
awards.description:
Due to his dedication, compliance to all TP Values and continuous hard work, we have the pleasure to announce that Ahmed Gamal El Din has been officially promoted to be a Financial Analyst for Teleperformance Egypt.
Congratulations Ahmed and good luck in the new challenge! 

profile_positions.description:
- Responsible for 9 Countries in the region (Netherlands, Germany, Poland, Serbia, Croatia, Bosnia, Slovenia, Macedonia and Egypt)

- Providing leadership, direction and management of the finance and accounting teams
- Providing strategic recommendations to the CEO/Managing Director and members of the executive management team
- Managing the processes for financial forecasting and budgets, and overseeing the preparation of all financial reporting
- Advising on long-term business and financial planning
- Establishing and developing relations with senior management and external partners and stakeholders
- Preparing & presenting to the executives business cases for potential expansion and M&As
- Reviewing all formal finance, HR and IT related procedures
- M&As team member and leading the merging/integration processes
profile_positions.title: Chief Financial Officer Central Europe

profile_positions.description:
Central Europe Senior Business Controller

Act as Central of Europe Finance Lead and responsible of team of business controller for 6 countries in Europe and present Central Europe region to HQ top management.

Participating in geographic expansions and M&A case studies.
profile_positions.title: Senior Business Controller Central Europe Region

profile_positions.description:
Project Finance Manager

Managing large scale of E-Commerce & Retail project with almost 1000 employee  within 4 Sites in Netherlands and 1 site in Lisbon, Portugal


•	Responsible for performing special projects to improve process efficiency and performance Projects as assigned by Management
•	Provide timely, relevant and accurate reporting & analysis of the results of the division’s performance against historical, budgeted, forecasted and strategic planning results to facilitate decision-making toward the achievement of the budget and strategic plan
•	Financial Planning & Analysis (FP&A) business unit analysts by being the first point of contact for issues and questions.
•	Preparation of budget and rolling forecast preparation on quarterly basis (by client and month) 
•	Set up key assumptions (FTEs, Hours, Prices) for revenue and identify costs 
•	Budget control and follow-up
•	Monitor cost efficiency on daily basis 
•	Monitor Gross Margin using the Daily P&L and follow-up on key assumptions
•	Review of monthly actual versus budget and forecast
•	Project pricing and feasibility 
•	Preparing board member presentation on quarterly basis.

Accomplishments:-

-	Due to budget accuracy of 98.6% and stable financial performance by achieving financials targets for 11 months in row, I have been asked by top management to manage and support all project’s operationally and financially 
-	Creating & Designing daily performance monitoring report that merging 3 system outputs to monitor daily operations & financial performance and comparing it with the budget
profile_positions.title: Project Finance Manager

profile_positions.description:
•	Participate to the strategic plan
•	Preparing the original budget and rolling forecast on quarterly basis (by client and month) 
•	Cash reconciliations, payment date accounting, monthly reporting and report production, daily modeling, analysis and reporting and financial Analysis
•	Perform monthly balance sheet, income statement and changes in financial position/budget variance analysis.
•	Responsible for performing special projects to improve process efficiency and performance Projects as assigned by Management
•	Provide timely, relevant and accurate reporting & analysis of the results of the division’s performance against historical, budgeted, forecasted and strategic planning results to facilitate decision-making toward the achievement of the budget and strategic plan.
•	Financial Planning & Analysis (FP&A) business unit analysts by being the first point of contact for issues and questions.
•	Demonstrate appropriate understanding/working knowledge of accounting principles and internal controls, and apply them.
•	Capex follow up and compare to budget on monthly basis.
•	Preparing and consolidating financial Statements Egypt & UAE
•	Preparing the financial statement for the external auditors for the yearly closure
•	Establish P&L actual figures by site (including EBT)
•	Monitor cost efficiency on monthly basis. 
•	Monitor Gross Margin using the Daily P&L and follow-up on key assumptions
•	Review of monthly actual versus budget and forecast
•	Responsible of AR & billing process and payment terms 
•	Preparing board member presentation on quarterly basis.
•	Project pricing and feasibility 

Accomplishments:
-	Preparing the budget and rolling forecast for almost 25 project for 5 years with accuracy above 95%
-	Participated with the top management for the feasibility and financial studies for expanding and opening a new site in UAE.
-	Participated with external parties for designing, merging, mapping Microsoft Dynamics GP financial statements reports with SAP

profile_positions.description:

volunteer_experiences.description:
I prepared a proposal for 3 innovative ideas for maximizing company's revenue and improve gross margin by cost deduction plan and within a year i received a proposal with a position of company's financial analyst.

1.Educational Center.
2.New Electricity system
3.Establishing new process for employee's shift
